description:
Fielder returns the field names on a Thing as a list of texts. Each instance of Fielder can retrieve the field names for up to six different types of Things, with various options for how the strings should be formatted.

Fielder is Karma-Ware: Learn more and support my efforts here: https://grupz.com/karma
name: Fielder: Get Field Names for Things
plugin_instructions:
Drop Fielder on your page. Configure the types of Things for which you want to get the field names. (Use an expression, for example, like, "Do a Search for Thing:first item". You just need to provide a single item. Fielder does the rest

The lists of texts representing the field names appear at Fielder's "Field Names List n" outputs.

You like? Contribute here: https://grupz.com/karma
